description: UI: Authenticated user can load /msp/workflows and see the Workflow Designer header. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: Unauthenticated visit to /msp/workflows redirects to /auth/msp/signin. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: User without workflow:manage sees read-only message and cannot edit steps. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: User without workflow:manage does not see New Workflow or Save Draft controls. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: User with workflow:manage but without workflow:publish sees Save Draft but not Publish. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: User with workflow:publish sees Publish button enabled for saved drafts. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: User without workflow:admin does not see Dead Letter or Audit tabs. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: User with workflow:admin can access Dead Letter and Audit tabs. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: Workflow Settings panel hidden for system workflows when user lacks admin. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: Workflow Settings panel visible for system workflows when user has admin. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: Permissions fetch failure surfaces a toast and disables privileged controls. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: Registry discovery failure surfaces a toast and blocks node palette usage. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: Workflow list shows total count and buttons for each definition. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: Selecting a workflow loads its draft definition into metadata fields. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: Active workflow button shows selected styling and persists across tab switches. Mocks: non-target dependencies.

UI: Trigger event name input creates trigger on non-empty value. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: Clearing trigger event name removes trigger from draft. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
UI: Save Draft persists metadata and steps, reloading keeps changes. Mocks: non-target dependencies.
